sourcesContent:
Welcome to {{title}}

  • {{product.name}}
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Pagination } from './models/pagination'; import { Product } from './models/product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'Divo'; products: Product[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.http.get>("https://localhost:7239/api/product").subscribe({ next: response => this.products = response.data, error: error => console.error('There was an error!', error), complete: () => console.log('Request completed') }); } }
